name: Surviving with a Bat
description:
You're in the role of a former professional baseball player in a post-apocalyptic city. You can only count on your good old bat to deal with the imminent infestation.

Main features:


  • A small open world for you to explore.
  • Countless character skins for you to choose from.
  • Countless enemies with fun visuals.
  • Highscore system for you to challenge yourself.
  • Immersive day and night weather system.
  • Fun and memorable sound effects.
  • Responsive controls.
  • Advanced settings for better player experience.

And more secrets to discover!
